column1: #Text=Sokka says : " Toph , while I was in town , I found something that you 're not gon na like . "
#Text=Toph says : " Well it sounds like a sheet of paper , but I guess you 're referring to what 's on the sheet of paper . "
#Text=" Sokka says : " Well yeah , actually , it does look pretty good .
#Text=These scams are drawing too much attention to us .
#Text=" Toph says : " Do n't be such a worrywart like your sister .
#Text=Think of it this way : Now you 've got plenty of money to help with the invasion plan .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Well , that is true .
#Text=I had this idea of making armor for Appa .
#Text=" Toph says : " Here 's a little extra , so you can get yourself a nice map of the Fire Nation .
#Text=" Sokka says : " I do like expensive atlases .
#Text=" Toph says : " Of course you do .
#Text=And that 's why this wanted poster is going to stay our little secret .
#Text=" Katara says : " Sokka , tell me you did n't buy a bird .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Not just a bird , a messenger bird .
#Text=Now we can send messages all over the world .
#Text=" Aang says : " Wow , how does it work ?
#Text=Uh , I never actually thought about that .
#Text=" Katara says : " And I suppose you do n't think what you 're doing is dangerous at all ?
#Text=" Toph says : " No , I do n't .
#Text=" Toph says : " I do n't know !
#Text=" Katara says : " It 's a wanted poster of you !
#Text=" Toph says : " Where did you get that !?
#Text=" Katara says : " It does n't matter where I got it .
#Text=The fact is - " Toph says : " You went through my stuff !
#Text=" Katara says : " Your stuff was messy and I was just straightening up , and I happened to stumble across it !
#Text=But you 've been so out of control lately , I knew something was up !
#Text=I knew you were hiding something and you were !
#Text=Do n't you walk away from me while I 'm talking to you !
#Text=Or what are you gon na do ?
#Text=" Katara says : " I wish I could !
#Text=" Toph says : " Well you ca n't !
#Text=Because you 're not my mom , and you 're not their mom !
#Text=" Katara says : " I never said I was !
#Text=" Toph says : " No , but you certainly act like it !
#Text=You think it 's your job to boss everyone around , but it 's not !
#Text=You 're just a regular kid like the rest of us !
#Text=So stop acting like you can tell me what to do !
#Text=" Katara says : " I do n't act that way !
#Text=" Katara says : " What do you think , Aang ?
#Text=I , uh - " Katara says : " Stop rubbing your eye and speak clearly when you talk !
#Text=" Toph says : " I ca n't be around you right now !
#Text=" Katara says : " Well , I ca n't be around you !
#Text=Why ca n't they just get along ?
#Text=You wan na test out my messenger hawk with me ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " I 'm going to send a note to Katara and say it 's from Toph , who wants to apologize .
#Text=" Aang says : " I got ta say , Sokka , you continue to impress me with your ideas .
#Text=" Aang says : " I guess Plan B is we send a note to Toph pretending it 's from Katara .
#Text=" Sokka says : " I think we 're gon na run into a similar problem .
#Text=Looks like I 'm gon na have to do this without your help .
#Text=" Toph says : " So lem me guess : You brought me out here to tell me that your sister 's not as annoying as I make her out to be .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Nah , she 's pretty much a pain .
#Text=She 's always got to be right about everything and she gets all bossy and involved and in your business ... " Toph says : " Yeah .
#Text=I do n't know how you could deal with it .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Actually , in a way , I rely on it .
#Text=" Toph says : " I do n't understand .
#Text=" Sokka says : " When our mom died , that was the hardest time in my life .
#Text=Our family was a mess , but Katara ?
#Text=She stepped up and took on so much responsibility .
#Text=She helped fill the void that was left by our mom .
#Text=" Toph says : " I guess I never thought about that .
#Text=" Sokka says : " I 'm gon na tell you something crazy .
#Text=I never told anyone this before , but honestly ?
#Text=I 'm not sure I can remember what my mother looked like .
#Text=It really seems like my whole life , Katara 's been the one looking out for me .
#Text=She 's always been the one that 's there .
#Text=And now , when I try to remember my mom , Katara 's is the only face I can picture .
#Text=" Toph says : " The truth is sometimes Katara does act motherly , but that 's not always a bad thing .
#Text=She 's compassionate and kind , and she actually cares about me .
#Text=Do n't ever tell her I said any of this !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Hey , my lips are sealed .
#Text=Um , I wan na - " Toph says : " Katara , stop .
#Text=These scams are out of control , and I 'm done with them .
#Text=" Katara says : " Actually I was n't going to apologize .
#Text=I was gon na say ... I wan na pull a scam with you .
#Text=" Katara says : " Not just any scam .
#Text=" Toph says : " You know I 'm in !
